prev.title: Account Management: Managing Your Cell Phone Number

title: Account Management: Managing Devices
body:
Account Management: Managing Devices¶

The Maha Platform keeps track of all the devices (within the last six months) with which your account has been accessed, along with when you were last active, if you enabled push, and a fingerprint associated with the device.

  1. Click on your profile (a circle with your initials or profile picture) located in the ribbon

  2. Click Manage Security

  3. Click Manage Devices

  4. Click on a device to view device details

  5. Manage previous devices from your current device:

    • Remove the device from your history by clicking Remove this Device

    • Terminate your session by clicking Signout
rellinks: Account Management: Managing Your Cell Phone Number
